pkgmetadata.longdescription: The ntfs-3g driver is an open source, GPL licensed, third generation Linux NTFS driver for 32-bit, little-endian architectures which was implemented by the Linux-NTFS project. It provides full read-write access to NTFS, excluding access to encrypted files, writing compressed files, changing file ownership, access right.

use.flag: Use external FUSE library instead of internal one. Must be disabled for unprivileged mounting to work.
Build and install the ntfsdecrypt application.
